%1$s%2$s (제한된 속도)
 **%3$s초 후 이 명령어를 다시 사용할 수 있어요.**
ratelimit.spam_1: 건강을 위해서 쉬세요 ㅠㅠ *재사용 대기시간이 재설정되기 전에 시도하면 제한된 속도가 계속 증가한다는 것을 기억하세요!*

general.generic_error: 만약 원한다면 저희 **고객 지원 서버**(`support.mantaro.site`)나 저희 GitHub 페이지(`https://github.com/Kodehawa/MantaroBot`)를 확인해주세요. 제발 저를 폭파시키지 말라고 말해줘요. 그리고 신고할 때 오류 ID를 잊지 말아줘요!
boom_quotes: 메구밍이 우리성을 폭발 시킨 것처럼 보이네요..
으어, 보아하니 저의 주인은 바닥에 있는 0과 1을 잊었어요 :<
ㅈ..제 생각엔 여기 불이 좀 난 것 같아요... 제 주인님께 한 번 보라고 말씀하시는 게 좋을 것 같아요.
뭔가 잘못됐을 수도 있지만, ㅇ..어, 제가 고칠 수 있어요!
ratelimit_quotes: 와... 너무 빨리 전화하시네요... 제가 얼빠질지도 몰라요!
계속 이렇게 빨리 가면 속도위반 딱지를 떼일 것 같아요!
이봐요, 멈춰봐요, 아직 내 휴식이 끝나지 않았다고요!
mod_quotes: ㅇ..이런, 방금 누가 심하게 맞은 것 같은데요!
그냥 이쪽에서 건전한 관리자가 일을 하고 있어요...
ㅇ..어... 으..음, 누가 방금 문으로 열고 들어갔어요.

fish.dust: %1$s하루가 끝났고, 여러분의 양동이는 먼지만 모을 수 있었어요. (황사 레벨 %2$s)

trash.overflow: %1$s낚시를 하다가 쓰레기를 발견하셨는데, 보관함이 가득 차서 다시 물속으로 던져야만 했어요...
trash.success: %1$s침착하게 낚시를 하던 중, 떠 있는 것을 발견했어요 %2$s 근데 쓰레기처럼 보이네요 ㅠㅠ

crate.overflow: 낚시하다가 **%1$s**을(를) 발견하셨는데, 이미 너무 많아서 다시 바다에 던졌어요...
crate.success: 낚시를 하는 동안 %1$s **%2$s**을(를) 발견해서 수집했어요. `~>opencrate <상자 이름>`으로 가서 열어보세요. 상자 열쇠가 필요해요!

fish.overflow: %1$s낚시를 하다가 물고기를 발견하셨는데, 보관함이 가득 차서 일부를 다시 물속으로 던져야만 했어요...
fish.success: %1$s침착하게 낚시를 하는 동안 %2$s을(를) 발견하여 양동이에 보관했어요.
fish.success_money: %1$s침착하게 낚시를 하는 동안 %2$s 및 **$%3$d 크레딧**을 발견하여 양동이에 보관했어요.%4$s
fish.success_money_noitem: %1$s침착하게 낚시를 하는 동안 **$%2$d 크레딧**을 발견하여 주머니에 보관했어요.
fish.waifu_help: 와이프가 와서 낚시 모험에 참여했고 여러분 둘 다 더 많은 것을 얻어요!
fish.shark_success: %1$s어떻게든 상어를 잡았군요. 정말 멋진 막대기군요, 그렇죠?
fish.fossil_success: %1$s당신은 물고기를 찾으려고 하다가 화석을 잡았어요. 이것은 상당한 가치가 있거나 캐스팅에 사용될 수 있다고 믿어요.
fish.missing_equipped: %1$s%2$s 막대기가 장착되어 있지만 보관함에 더 이상 이러한 막대기가 없네요! 장착할 막대기가 재설정되었어요.
fish.broken_drop: %1$s막대기가 부러졌지만 고칠 수 있어요. 파손된 아이템이 있어요: %2$s *%3$s*
fish.no_rod_equipped: %1$s막대기가 장착되어 있지 않군요. 모험을 시작하기 위해 하나의 장비를 갖추려면 `~>equip <막대기 이름>`을 실행해야 해요!

tempban.no_reason: %2$s이유 없이 누군가를 임시로 차단할 수는 없습니다.

music_usage.2: - **대기열 음악은 YouTube 또는 SoundCloud에서 가져와요** `~>play`를 사용하세요 예시: `~>play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAolFWjGfMs` *사용 중인 음성 채널에 자동으로 연결되요*
music_usage.3: - **YouTube에서 음악을 검색해 가져와요** `~>play <검색할 용어>` ( < , > 없이) 예시:  `~>play see you again` (선택 상자가 나타나면 *숫자*를 입력하세요!)
music_usage.4: - **SoundCloud에서 음악을 검색하여** 가져와요 `~>play soundcloud <검색할 용어>`를 사용하세요 예시: `~>play soundcloud hot milk`
music_usage.6: - **대기열에서 트랙을 제거**하려면 `~>removetrack`을 사용하면 되요 노래가 대기 중인 위치(대기열에서 확인할 수 있음)를 인수로 삼아요
music_usage.7: - **일시 중지 또는 일시 중지 해제**는 `~>pause`를 사용하세요
music_usage.10: - 마지막으로 **노래 반복**은 `~>repeat`을 사용하고 **대기열 반복**는 `~>repeat queue`을 사용하세요. 반복이 켜져 있는 동안`~>repeat`'을 사용하면 꺼져요
music_usage.11: 자세한 내용은`~>help <명령어 이름>`을 사용하세요. ( <> 없이 명령어 이름을 원하는 명령어로 바꾸세요)
music_usage.12: 음악을 즐기시고 만타로(Mantaro)를 이용해 주셔서 감사해요!

lang.info:
%1$s`~>opts language set <언어 코드>`를 사용하여 서버 언어(해당하는 경우)를 변경할 수 있어요. 개인 언어 환경 설정은 `~>profile lang <언어 코드>`를 사용하여 변경할 수 있어요.
**지원하는 언어:** `%2$s`
언어가 여기에 없고 도움이 필요하면 언제든지 고객 지원 서버에 가입하고 번역 작업에 참여하세요!

season.info:
*시즌*은 보통 6개월의 기간으로, 플레이어가 상금 또는 평판 순위표 상위 10개 슬롯을 놓고 경쟁합니다. 수상자들은 시즌 성적에 따라 배지와 경품을 받게 되요.
이는 좀 더 경쟁적인 프레임을 허용하고(이전에는 돈이 꽤 오래었어요) 게임을 좀 더 재미있게 만들기 위해서예요.
시즌은 `~season`을 이용해 볼 수 있어요. 프로필, 광물, 생선 그리고 벨런스와 같은 명령어들이 필요로 할 것이고, 게임, 약탈, 일상, 평판은 전세계적인 시즌 프로필은 돈과 명성을 줄 거예요.
season.info_2:
현재 시즌은 **%1$s**이고 플레이어 **%2$s*명이 현재 참가 중이에요!

시작은 '~>leaderboard money -season', `~>leaderboard rep -season`, `~>leaderboard games -season`이에요.
게임 중! <3
만타로(Mantaro)를 즐겨주셔서 감사합니다.

music_error.timeout: %1$s%2$s에 연결할 수 없어요: 연결 시간이 초과되었어요. 서버 영역을 변경하고 명령을 다시 실행할게요.
music_error.unknown: %1$s%2$s에 연결할 수 없어요: 알 수 없는 오류

music_general.not_working:
%1$s현재 YouTube에서 대부분의 대형 봇의 트래픽을 차단하여 음악이 작동하지 않아요. 저희 Patreon 봇은 아직 작동 중이므로, 만타로(Mantaro)에 매달 $4를 한 번 기부해 보시기 바라요. 또한 우리가 음악 전체를 고치는 쪽으로 우리의 노력을 돌리는 데 도움이 될 거예요.

불편을 드려 죄송해요. SoundCloud 검색을 사용해 보세요! (`~>play soundcloud <검색할 용어>)`
music_general.no_song: %1$s어떤 노래를 틀고 싶은지 말해주세요! *(YouTube, SoundCloud, Twick URL 또는 검색 쿼리 허용)*
music_general.not_playing: %1$s저는 지금 아무 것도 플레이하고 있지 않아요. 만약 이것이 오류라고 생각하신다면,<https://support.mantaro.site>에 신고해주세요
music_general.no_player: %1$s여기에서 어떠한 음악 플레이어도 찾을 수 없네요... (다시 한 번 플레이 해보실 수 있나요?)
music_general.not_connected: %1$s현재 재생 중인 음성 채널에 연결되어 있지 않네요!(오류라고 생각되면 <https://support.mantaro.site>에 신고해주세요)
music_general.track_error: %1$s이런, 이 트랙을 연주하는 동안 뭔가 잘못됐어요! 불편을 끼쳐드려 죄송해요, 다음 곡이 있으면 재생해 볼게요.
music_general.queue_finished:
%1$s현재 대기열 재생을 마쳤어요! 즐거웠기를 바라요. 봇에 대한 도움이 필요하면 <https://support.mantaro.site>에 참가할 수 있어요
%2$s
music_general.soundcloud_no_args: %1$s노래 이름을 알려줘야죠, 난 마법사가 아니니까 짐작이 안 가요 ㅠㅠ
music_general.too_many_errors: %1$s이 세션에 오류가 너무 많아요. 멈추는 중...
music_general.no_vc_found: %1$s제가 음성 채널에 연결이 되야 하는데 음성 채널와 연결이 안 되는 건가요? 다시 해보세요.

queue.no_track_found_np: 아우 것도 없거나 제목/지속 시간도 찾을 수 없네요
queue.nothing_playing:
여긴 아무것도 없어요, 그냥 먼지뿐이에요. 몇 노래가 대기열에 없나요?
여기에 노래가 있다고 생각하는데 안 나온다면 `~queue 1`을 사용해 보세요.
queue.nothing_playing_2: **노래 한 곡이 재생되고 더 많은 노래를 추가하지 않았다면, 여기엔 사실 먼지가 있을 뿐이에요. 원하는 대로 더 많은 노래를 대기열에 넣을 수 있어요!**
queue.page_overflow: 여긴 아무것도 없어요, 그냥 먼지뿐이에요. 몇 페이지 뒤로 가보는 게 어때요?
queue.page_overflow_2: 여기에 노래가 있다고 생각하는데 안 나온다면 `~>queue 1`을 사용해 보세요.
queue.clear_error: %1$s음성 채널에 연결되어 있지 않거나 DJ가 아니예요.

loader.no_matches: %1$s검색 결과는 나오지 않았어요. 만약 *모든 노래*의 검색이 이 메시지가 표시된다면, 그 대신 동안 `~>play soundcloud <검색 술어>`를 사용해는 것이 좋아요. YouTube에 대한 직접적인 링크도 작동해요.
loader.over_queue_limit: %1$s%2$s을(를) 대기열에 넣을 수 없어요: 대기열 노래 한도(%3$s개)를 초과했어요!
loader.over_32_minutes: %1$s%2$s을(를) 대기열에 넣을 수 없어요: 트랙이 32분보다 길어요! (%3$s)
loader.fair_queue_limit_reached: %1$s**공정한 대기열 %2$d 레벨을 초과했어요 (정확히 동일한 노래가 너무 많아요)**

move.cannot_connect: %1$s연결할 수 없어요: 대화할 수 있는 권한이나 채널을 이동할 수 있는 권한이 없어요.

repeat.song_repeat: %1$s현재 노래를 반복하고 있어요. 이 명령을 다시 실행하여 비활성화하세요.

nextsong.format: %1$s대기열에 있는 다음 곡: **%2$s**(%3$s) | *대기열에 있는 총 곡: %4$,d*

skip.success: %1$s필요한 득표 수에 도달했어요, 노래 건너뛰는 중...

removetrack.invalid_number: (%1$s`%2$s`) 범위 중 하나가 올바른 숫자가 아니예요!

stop.success: %1$s필요한 득표 수에 도달했어요, 플레이어를 멈추는 중...

volume.premium_only:
%1$s프리미엄 전용 기능이에요. 이와 같은 프리미엄 혜택을 받으려면 Patreon (https://www.patreon.com/mantaro)에 서약을 하면 되요. 이해해주셔서 고마워요.
프리미엄 기능은 사용자 또는 서버에 바운드 할 수 있어요. 기부할 경우 지원 길드에 가입하여 요청하세요.

lyrics.error_searching: %1$s이 트랙을 검색하는 동안 오류가 발생했거나 결과를 찾을 수 없었어요.
lyrics.footer: 만타로를 이용해 줘서 고마워요! 페이지: %1$d, 총: %2$d.

prefix.header:
%1$s기본 접두사는 %2$s이에요.(어느 것에도 응답해요!). 서버 접두어는 `%3$s`이에요(이 서버에서만 사용 가능해요). ~>opts prefix set <접두사>를 사용하여 새 접두사를 설정할 수 있어요. <>는 포함하지 마세요.
만약 무슨 질문이 있다면 <https://support.mantaro.site>에 참가할 수 있어요
prefix.none: 이 서버는 사용자 지정 접두사가 설정되지 않았어요.

custom.no_args: %1$s이 명령으로 수행할 작업을 지정해야 해요. 자세한 내용은 명령어 도움말을 확인하세요!
custom.incorrect_args: %1$s잘못된 인수예요. `~>help custom` 또는 https://github.com/Mantaro/MantaroBot/wiki/Custom-Commands에서 어떻게 사용하는지 더 많은 도움을 받으세요. 위키를 읽은 후 추가로 문제가 발생하면 <https://support.mantaro.site>를 참조하세요.
custom.error_running: %1$s사용자 정의 명령을 실행하는 동안 오류가 발생했어요... 응답 내용 및 길이를 확인하세요(2000자 이상일 수 없어요).
custom.error_running_new:
%1$s사용자 정의 명령을 실행하는 동안 오류가 발생했어요. 응답, 내용, 길이를 확인하세요.
**Error:**
```%2$s```
custom.not_loaded: 봇이 아직 완전히 부팅되지 않았어요... 사용자 정의 명령어를 곧 사용할 수 있어요!
custom.nsfw_not_nsfw: %1$s이 명령어는 연령 제한으로 표시되므로 연령 제한 채널에서만 사용할 수 있어요.
custom.new_error:
%1$s만들려는 사용자 정의 명령어에 오류가 있어요(v3, 내용 확인).
**Error:**
```%2$s```

ls.description:
**이 서버에는 이 서버의 모든 사용자 정의(사용자 정의) 명령어가 표시됩니다.** 여기서 모든 명령은 어떤 형태나 형태로든 봇 자체와 연관되지 않아요

사용자 정의 명령은 에뮬레이션 작업 명령어까지 다양한 상황을 처리할 수 있는 사용자(일반적으로 서버 관리자)에 의해 생성된 명령어예요.
사용자 정의 명령어를 만드는 방법에 대한 자세한 내용은 [이 위키 페이지](https://github.com/Mantaro/MantaroBot/wiki/Custom-Commands)를 참조하길 바라요.
 
**목록:**
ls.footer: 이 서버의 총 사용자 정의 명령어: %1$s개

custom.invalid: %1$s잘못된 명령어 선택이에요. 명령 도움말(`help custom`)을 확인하세요.

view.not_found: %1$s이 이름을 가진 사용자 정의 명령어가 없어요.

raw.description: 이 명령은 원초적 형식(명령어에 입력하는 내용)으로 모든 응답의 목록이에요.

make.start_text:
%1$s**"사용자 정의 명령어 `%2$s`을(를) 생성"**을 시작했어요**!
**저장하지 않고** 생성을 중지하려면 `&~>stop`을 보내세요.
**새 명령어 저장**을 중지하려면 `&~>save`를 보내세요. 명령어 응답을 추가하려면 `&`로 아무 문자나 보내세요. 이 명령어을 연령 제한으로 표시하려면 `~>nsfw`를 사용하고 되돌리려면 `~sfw`를 사용하세요.
make.no_responses_added: %1$s아무 응답이 추가되지 않았어요. 만들기를 저장 없이 멈추는 중...
make.no_name_specified: %1$s생성할 사용자 정의 명령어의 이름을 정하지 않았어요!

eval.new_error:
%1$s이 사용자 정의 명령어을 감정하는 동안 오류가 발생했어요.
**오류**:
```%2$s```
eval.error:
%1$s이 사용자 정의 명령어을 감정하는 동안 오류가 발생했어요!
%2$s

import.not_found: %1$s검색 결과와 일치하는 사용자 정의 명령어가 없어요.
import.note: (자신이 속한 길드의 사용자 정의 명령어만 선택할 수 있어요)
import.success: 총 %3$d 응답으로 길드 `%2$s`에서 가져온 사용자 정의 명령어 `%1$s`이에요.

edit.not_enough_args: %1$s명령어, 지수(Index) 및 새 응답을 지정해야 해요

add.not_enough_args: %1$s추가할 명령어의 명령어 이름과 응답을 지정해야 해요.
add.empty_content: %1$s이 사용자 정의 명령어의 내용을 지정해야 해요
add.too_many_commands: %1이 서버에 명령어가 너무 많아서 더 이상 추가할 수 없어요(+100개). 프리미엄 길드에서 우회할 수 있어요(클릭<https://patreon.com/mantaro>).

custom.character_not_allowed: %1$s이 문자는 사용자 정의 명령어의 이름에 사용할 수 없어요.
custom.already_exists: %1$s`%2$s` 명령어는 이미 있어요. 기본적 봇 명령어예요.
custom.no_cc: %1$s이 길드에 등록된 사용자 정의 명령어가 없네요. 약간의 먼지만 있군요.
custom.admin_only:
이 길드는 관리자로부터 사용자 지정 명령 작성, 편집, 가져오기 및 평가만 허용해요.
**이제 디폴트(DEFAULT) 설정이에요.**
- 모든 사용자에게 이 작업을 허용하고 싶다면 관리자(Bot Commander 역할 또는 서버 관리 권한)인 경우 `~>opts admincustom false`를 실행하세요.
custom.not_found: %1$sThere's no Custom Command `%2$s` in this Guild.
custom.invalid_image: %1$sThis command contains an invalid image, please fix...
custom.invalid_string: %1$sThe string `{%2$s}` isn't valid, or the output is longer than 2000 characters.

mute.no_permissions: %1$sYou need to have either ban or kick members permission to mute.
mute.no_mute_role: %1$sThe mute role is not set in this server, you can set it by doing `~>opts muterole set <role>`
mute.null_mute_role: %1$sThe previously configured mute role on this server is now non-existent.
mute.no_users: %1$sYou need to give me an user to mute.
mute.no_manage_roles: %1$sI don't have permissions to administrate roles on this server.
mute.no_time: %1$sYou didn't specify any time. Remember that you need to add the `-time` argument and specify it there.
mute.time_not_specified: %1$sYou wanted time but didn't specify for how long.
mute.negative_time_notice: %1$sYou cannot mute someone for negative time. Unless you can bend space-time that is.
mute.default_time_too_long: %1$sThe default mute timeout length is too long (Maximum: 10 days)...
mute.time_too_long: %1$sThe specified mute timeout length is too long (Maximum: 10 days)...
mute.already_muted: %1$sThis user already has a mute role assigned. Please do `~>unmute` to un-mute them.
mute.self_hierarchy_error: %1$sI cannot assign the mute role to this user because they're in a higher hierarchy than me, or the role is in a higher hierarchy!
mute.user_hierarchy_error: %1$sI cannot assign the mute role to this user because they're in a higher hierarchy than me, or the role is in a higher hierarchy than you!

unmute.no_permissions: %1$sYou need to have either ban or kick members permission to un-mute!
unmute.no_mentions: %1$sYou need to mention at least one user to un-mute.
unmute.no_role_assigned: %1$sThis user doesn't have the mute role assigned to them.

love.no_mention: %1$sYou need to mention at least 1 user.
love.yourself_note: You're a special creature and you should love yourself more than anyone <3

loveletter.no_letter: %1$sYou have no love letters in your inventory, so you don't have anything to write your letter on.
loveletter.empty: %1$sYou cannot leave the love letter empty.
loveletter.no_marriage: %1$sYou aren't married, you cannot write a love letter for yourself...
loveletter.not_proposing_player: %1$sYou aren't the player who proposed this marriage!
loveletter.already_done: %1$sThis marriage already has a love letter assigned. Check it using `marry status`.
loveletter.too_long: %1$sThe love letter is too long (maximum is 500 characters)
loveletter.cannot_see: %1$sI cannot find the user that you're married to... Probably they aren't in any server with me.

loveletter.confirmed: %1$sSuccessfully delivered the love letter to your loved one! Check it using `marry status`.
loveletter.scrapped: %1$sYou still have time to think on what to write, no need to rush!

status.no_marriage: %1$sYou aren't married, so I guess your status is uh... "not married" (If you see a marriage in your profile and see this message that means you are in the old system, try remarrying)

marry.no_mention: %1$sMention the user you want to marry.
marry.marry_yourself_notice: %1$sYou cannot marry yourself, as much as you may want to.
marry.marry_bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot marry a bot. I don't think this is Futurama... yet. Wait, could bots and humans marry there?
marry.no_ring: %1$sYou cannot propose without two marriage rings! You can buy them by doing `~>market buy 2 ring` and then try proposing again <3
marry.confirmation:
%1$s%2$s, type with **yes** or **no** to the marriage proposal from %3$s
%4$sThis timeouts in 120 seconds.
marry.ring_check_fail: %1$sYou cannot marry with less than two rings on your inventory :(

divorce.not_married: %1$sYou aren't married with anyone, why don't you find that special someone?
divorce.success: %1$sNow you're single. That's nice I guess.

waifu.bot: %1$sA bot can't be a waifu, even if you want to...
waifu.notice: This feature isn't meant to have any kind of relationship, either implicit or explicit, with real life events.

stats.format:
%1$s **Money weight value:** %2$,d
%1$s **Badge weight value:** %3$,d
%1$s **Experience weight value:** %4$,d
%1$s **Claim weight value:** %5$,d
%1$s **Reputation multiplier:** %6$.2fx

claim.no_user: %1$sYou didn't mention any user to claim.
claim.locked: %1$sYou're currently unable to perform this action.
claim.key_locked: %1$sThe user you tried to claim is key-locked and cannot be claimed.
claim.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to claim this waifu **(Cost: %2$s credits)**
claim.not_enough_slots: %1$sYou don't have enough slots available to claim this waifu. (Total slots: %2$s, Used slots: %3$s)
claim.not_found: %1$sI can't find any user with this query.

unclaim.no_user: %1$sYou need to mention a waifu to un-claim.
unclaim.confirmation:
%1$sAre you *sure* you want to un-claim %2$s? The cost to un-claim this waifu is **%3$s credits**. Type *yes* to confirm or *no* to cancel
%4$sThis times out in 1 minute.
unclaim.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to un-claim this waifu!
unclaim.player_locked: %1$sYou cannot do this at the moment.
unclaim.success: %1$sSuccessfully unclaimed `%2$s` with a cost of **%3$s credits**.
unclaim.not_found: %1$sI can't find any user with this query. If you need to unclaim an unknown user, use their ID and append `-unknown` at the end.

buyslot.locked: %1$sYou're currently unable to perform this action.
buyslot.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy more slots! You need %2$,d credits.
buyslot.success: %1$sSuccessfully bought this slot for %2$s, you currently have %3$s total slots and %4$s available slots.

optout.notice: %1$sYou've opted out of the entire waifu system, so you can't use this.
optout.warning:
%1$sDo you want to opt-out from the waifu system? THIS IS PERMANENT AND CAN'T BE REVERTED. 
If you only want to be opted out of new claims and wanna use the waifu system as usual, please use `~>profile claimlock` instead.
You won't be able to claim or be claimed, and all the claims over you will be removed.
Type `yes` or `no`. Typing yes will opt you out, no will cancel it.
optout.success: %1$sYou successfully opted out of the waifu system.
optout.claim_notice: %1$sThe user you're trying to claim opted out.

waifu.description_header:
Here's a list with all of your beloved waifus, sorted by addition date.
*You can have a maximum of %1$,d waifus as of now.*

If you wish to check your waifu stats, use `~>waifu stats`
waifu.no_waifu:
No waifus to see here, just dust :(
You can get waifus by claiming someone! Use `~>waifu claim` to get started.

coinflip.over_limit: %1$sHold in there! The limit is 1,000 coin flips
coinflip.no_repetitions: %1$sYou need to specify an Integer for the amount of repetitions
coinflip.success: %1$s Your result from **%2$,d** time(s) yielded **%3$,d** heads and **%4$,d** tails

inventory.bot_notice: %1$sHere, bots have no inventory. Well, sometimes you might wish they had one but then it would only be a `~>market dump`
inventory.brief:
**%1$s's inventory:** %2$s

*If you want a more detailed version of this, use `~>inventory -info`. Enjoy your day!*
inventory.calculate: %1$s%2$s will get **%3$,d credits** if all of the items are sold.
inventory.brief_notice: You can use `~>inventory -brief` to get a mobile friendly version.

cast.no_item_found: %1$sI didn't find any item matching that. If the item name has spaces, wrap it in "quotes"
cast.item_not_cast: %1$sYou cannot cast this item. You can check `~>cast ls` for a list of castable items. If the item name has spaces, wrap the name in quotes. Example: `~>cast "star pick" "comet wrench"`
cast.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to cast this. **(Cost: %2$s)**
cast.no_item: %1$sYou don't have the necessary item *%2$s* to proceed with this cast.
cast.not_enough_items: %1$sYou don't have enough of item *%2$s* to proceed. **(Needed: %3$s, Current: %4$s)**
cast.no_tool: %1$sYou need to have a %2$s to proceed with this cast!
cast.item_broke: Sadly, your wrench broke in the process, but you got your item!
cast.too_many: %1$sYou'd have more than 5000 of this item if you proceed. Try casting less of this object?
cast.low_tier: %1$sYou need at least a tier 2 wrench (at least a Comet Wrench) to cast more items per call. You currently have a tier %2$s wrench.
cast.not_enough_wrench_level: %1$sYour wrench is not powerful enough to cast this item. Maybe specify a more powerful one? *Wrench level: %2$s, Required level: %3$s*. Example: `~>cast "star pick" "comet wrench"`
cast.too_many_amount: %1$sYou can't cast that many of this item at once! Limit: %2$s, Attempt: %3$s. A sparkle wrench makes the limit double! Unless you're already using one.

ls.desc:
This is a list of the items you can cast using `~>cast`.
You can use full name or the short name (example: `~>cast "diamond pickaxe"`, or `~>cast "diamond p"`, works)
**Casting has a minimum cost of half the price of the item. The casting price will be shown down below.**.
Wrench tier 2 and 3 are comet and sparkle, respectively.

cast.dust: %1$sYou cannot cast with such a dusty inventory! *(Dust level: %2$s%%)*. Why not clean it up using `~>useitem mop`?
cast.wrench_multiple_use: Tip: *You can't use the wrench you are trying to cast with as ingredient!*

dump.no_item: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to dump.
dump.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to dump.
dump.non_existent: %1$sCannot dump a non-existent item! If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
dump.player_no_item: %1$sCannot dump an item you don't have!
dump.more_items_than_player: %1$sYou cannot dump more items than what you have.

price.non_existent: %1$sCannot check the price of a non-existent item. If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
price.no_price: %1$sThis item is not available neither for sell or buy (could be an exclusive collectible)
price.collectible: %1$sThis is a collectible item. (Sell value: %2$,d credits)
price.success: %1$sThe market value of %2$s**%3$s** is %4$s credits to buy it and you can get %5$s credits if you sell it.

sell.no_item_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to sell.
sell.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to sell.

all.confirmation: %1$sAre you *sure* you want to sell **all** of your items? This will clear your *whole* inventory. If you wanna sell individual items please use the amount. Type *yes* to confirm and *no* to cancel
all.success: %1$sYou sold all your inventory items and gained %2$,d credits!

sell.non_existent: %1$sYou cannot sell a non-existent item. If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
sell.no_sell_price: %1$sYou cannot sell an item that cannot be sold. (But you can `~>market dump` it)
sell.no_item_player: %1$sYou cannot sell an item you don't have.
sell.more_items_than_player: %1$sYou cannot sell more items than what you have.

buy.no_item_amount: %1$sYou need to specify the amount of that item (if it's only one, you don't need to specify the amount) and the item that you want to buy.
buy.invalid: %1$sNot a valid number of items to buy.
buy.non_existent: %1$sYou cannot buy an non-existent item. If you're lost, you can try typing the short name or wrapping the name in quotes.
buy.no_buy_price: %1$sYou cannot buy an item that cannot be bought.
buy.item_limit_reached: %1$sYou cannot buy more of that object.
buy.success: %1$sBought %2$,d %3$s for %4$,d credits successfully. You now have %5$,d credits.
buy.not_enough_money: %1$sYou don't have enough money to buy this item.

market.reference: You can buy and sell items using `~>market buy <item>` and `~>market sell <item>`. Check `~>help market` for more info.

itemtransfer.bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer items to a bot.
itemtransfer.locked_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer items now. (Player is locked)
itemtransfer.overflow: %1$sThis player has the maximum possible amount of this item (5000).
itemtransfer.multiple_items_error: %1$sYou don't have any of these items in your inventory
itemtransfer.error: %1$sYou don't have enough of this item in your inventory to do this!
itemtransfer.no_item_mention: %1$sYou need to specify the person to transfer the item and the item to transfer.

transfer.bot_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer money to a bot.
transfer.over_transfer_limit: %1$sYou cannot transfer this much money. (Limit: %2$,d credits)
transfer.receipt_overflow_notice: Cannot send money to this player.
transfer.no_money_notice: %1$sYou cannot transfer money you don't have.
transfer.receipt_over_limit: %1$sThis user already has too much money...
transfer.item_transfer: %1$sYou cannot transfer items using transfer, use the `transferitems` command instead.
transfer.party: You can only transfer to the same person (%1$s) once every 4 minutes.

ls.desc: This is a list of all interactive items in Mantaro. For more info about interactive items check the wiki!

useitem.use_command: %1$sFor this item you need to use the command that's linked to the item! (mine for pick, fish for the fishing rod)
useitem.no_items_specified: %1$sYou need to specify what item to use.
useitem.interactive_no_action: %1$sThis item has been marked as interactive, but has no action set. This item might use its own command? For example, picks use `~>mine`.
useitem.no_item: %1$sYou don't have this item in your inventory.
useitem.not_enough_items: %1$sYou don't have enough of this item.
useitem.invalid_amount: %1$sThe amount needs to be a valid number between `1` and `9`!

opts.note:
%1$sHey, if you're lost or want help on using opts, check <https://github.com/Mantaro/MantaroBot/wiki/Configuration> for a guide on how to use opts.
Note: Only administrators, people with Manage Server or people with the Bot Commander role can use this command!

list.header:
**Mantaro's Options List**
%1$s*All options must be prefixed with `~>opts` when running them*
%2$s

8ball.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify what you want the 8ball to answer.
8ball.error: %1$sI ran into an error while fetching the 8ball results.

list.name: Auto-role name:
list.no_autoroles: There aren't any autoroles setup in this server.
list.description: This are the current user-assignable auto roles on this server. You can use these by doing `~>iam <name of the role>`.

iam.deleted_role: %1$sThe role that this autorole corresponded to has been deleted
iam.error: %1$sI couldn't take from you **%2$s. Make sure that I have permission to add roles and that my role is above **%2$s**
iam.no_role: %1$sThere isn't an autorole with the name `%2$s`.
iam.no_iam: %1$sYou need to specify which auto-assignable role you want to assign yourself!

iamnot.no_args: %1$sYou have to specify what role you want me to remove from you, silly.

misc.reverse_missing: %1$sYou didn't provide any message to reverse.

poll.missing:
%1$sYou didn't include either the %2$s argument or it was empty!
%3$s
poll.invalid:
%1$sThis poll cannot build. **Remember that the options must be a maximum of 9 and a minimum of 2 and the timeout must be a maximum of 45m and a minimum of 30s.**
Options are separated with a comma, for example `1,2,3` (no spaces between them!). For spaced stuff use quotation marks at the start and end of the sentence. If you're really lost, there's an example on `~>help poll`
poll.other_poll_running: %1$sThere seems to be another poll running here...
poll.no_reaction_perms: %1$sSeems like I cannot add reactions here...
poll.too_long: This was too long to show, so I pasted it: %1$s
poll.success:
**Poll started. React to the number to vote.**
*%1$s*
Type &cancelpoll to cancel a running poll.
poll.error: %1$sAn unknown error has occurred while setting up a poll. Maybe try again? (internal error)
poll.result_screen: **Showing results for the poll started by %1$s** with name: *%2$s*
poll.incorrect_time_format: %1$sIncorrect time format. Remember, the proper time format it's a number followed by `h, m or s` (hours, minutes or seconds). Example: `-time 40m`

osustats.timeout: %1$sThe osu! api seems to be taking a nap. Maybe try again later?

osustats.error_detailed: Uh-oh... seems like I just received scramble soup as a response... (%1$s)

timezone.success: %1$sSaved timezone, your profile timezone is now: **%2$s**

description.no_argument:

description.no_content:
%1$sYou didn't specify what you want on your description.
For example, ~>profile description set Hi there!

description.success:

displaybadge.not_specified: %1$sYou need to specify your main badge!
displaybadge.reset_success: %1$sNo badge will show on the top of your profile now!

Your available badges: %2$s

lang.success: %1$sMantaro will now talk to you in `%2$s`
lang.invalid: %1$sThat language doesn't exist! You can use `reset` to reset your language settings.

equip.no_content: %1$sYou have to specify which item to equip!
equip.success: %1$sYou successfully equipped %2$s *%3$s*, which will be remembered next time you use the proper currency command.
equip.already_equipped: %1$sYou already have an item of this type equipped! Try `~>unequip <type>` (Type can be rod or pick) if you wanna unequip it.

unequip.no_content: %1$sYou need to specify a tool type to unequip, can be either `pick, rod`
unequip.equipment_recover: Since you never used your equipment, you got your %1$s back!
unequip.broken_equipment_recover: Your equipment was used, but you got a %1$s back, you can repair it if you need it later!
unequip.broken_equipment_recover_none: This equipment type had no broken type to recover from, and was used, so it vanished into the void, but you got %1$s credits back.

display.not_enough: %1$sNot enough valid widgets to put on your profile (minimum: 3). If you're lost, check `~>profile widgets ls`
display.success: %1$sSuccessfully set your new profile layout. New layout is `%2$s`
display.ls:
%1$sList of profile components:
%2$s **Widgets in Default Order:** `%3$s`
%2$s **Your widgets:** `%4$s`
You can use `~>profile widgets reset` to reset your profile display references
display.example:
Example: `~>profile widgets header, credits, reputation, birthday, marriage, badges`
*Any order works, the order here is the order that will make them appear in your profile*

claimlock.success: %1$sYou can't be waifu claimed anymore. This used up a claim key.
claimlock.no_key: %1$sYou don't have a claim key to do this.

info.not_specified: %1$sYou need to specify a badge to see the info of.

badges.profile_notice: If you think you got a new badge and it doesn't appear here, please use `~>profile` and then run this command again.
badges.info_notice: Use `~>badges info <badge name>` to get more information about a badge. [You can also check the wiki.](https://github.com/Mantaro/MantaroBot/wiki/Badge-reference-and-documentation)

badges.donate_notice: **You can get a badge for [supporting the development of Mantaro!](https://patreon.com/mantaro)!** (It might take some minutes to process)
badges.footer: Badges are like achievements, and they're gained through progression in Mantaro's game or by just using the bot.

%2$s

about.title: About Mantaro

description.1: Hello, I'm **Mantaro**! I'm here to make your life a little easier. To get started, type `~>help`!
description.3: **Moderation made easy** (`Mass kick/ban, prune commands, logs and more!`)
description.4: **Funny and useful commands**, see `~>help remindme` or `~>help hug` for examples.

credits.special_mentions: Thanks to bots.discord.pw, Carbonitex and discordbots.org for helping us with increasing the bot's visibility.
credits.thank_note: Much thanks to everyone above for helping make Mantaro better!

about.invite: Invite link: http://is.gd/mantaro (Commands this session: %1$,d | Current shard: %2$,d)

pet.no_content: %1$sYou need to specify the pet to look up the stats of (and the user you want to check the pet from, if it's not yours. Make sure to quote the name on this case!).
pet.not_found: %1$sI didn't find a pet with the provided name.
pet.character_not_allowed: %1$sThis character isn't allowed in pet names. Try another name?
pet.name: Name

petactions.general:
Pets are your companion on the usage of currency! **You can train them, pet them, feed them or have fights between your own pets or pets from other people!** To create a pet you need an incubator, which you can cast from milk, old beverage and diamonds, this will allow you to incubate a pet, which will require you to give it a name.

Pets can fight in PetBattle, which is a turn-based (ish) fight system based in a one-turn strategy, with an emergency turn on the half-turn if the HP difference between the pets is too different, which would allow you to change your strategy.

For competition, you need to use different skills, which will cater to different elements and types. You chose them at the start of your turn or half-turn.
Skills are the main weapon you have! But, pets can also have a main weapon equipped, based on their type and affection. The weapon shop is available at `~>petaction shop` and you can equip it using `~>petaction weapon`, weapons *do not* have damage multiplier by themselves, but they can improve the effectiveness of some attacks and skills, as the result of this, there are no melee weapons, as all damage on PetBattle is done based on their will, not on their actual life.

Do `~>help petaction` to get a list of the commands you can use with your pet.

birthday_enable.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify the channel name and the role name.
birthday_enable.public_role: %1$sYou cannot set the everyone role as a birthday role! Remember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.
birthday_enable.autorole: %1$sYou cannot set the autorole role as a birthday role! Remember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.
birthday_enable.warning: %1$sRemember that the birthday role is a role that gets assigned to the person when the birthday comes, and then removes when the day passes away.If you have any doubts on how to configure it, you can always join our support guild and ask. You can also check `~>opts help birthday enable` for an example.
birthday_enable.warning_1: This is because of how the birthday assigner works: It assigns a temporary role to the person having its birthday, and un-assigns it when the birthday day has passed. **This means that everyone with the birthday role will get the role removed the day the birthday passes through**. Please take caution when choosing what role to use, as a misconfiguration might make bad things happen (really)!
birthday_enable.warning_2: The role *has to be a newly created role or a role you don't use for anyone else*. It MUST NOT be a role you already have on your users.
birthday_enable.warning_3: Additionally the birthday cache (what is used to store them) is only updated every 23 hours. Meaning if you set your birthday today to tomorrow to test this announcer it will **not** work.
birthday_enable.warning_4: Type **yes** if you agree to set the role %2$s as a birthday role, and **no** to cancel. This timeouts in 45 seconds.
birthday_enable.success: %1$sBirthday logging enabled on this server with parameters -> Channel: `%2$s (%3$s)` and role: `%4$s (%5$s)`
birthday_enable.error_channel_1: %1$sI didn't find a channel or role!
birthday_enable.error_channel_2: *Remember, you don't have to mention neither the role or the channel, rather just type its name, order is <channel> <role>, without the leading "<>".* If the role contains spaces "wrap it in quotes like this"

birthday_disable.success: %1$sBirthday logging has been disabled on this server

admincustom.everyone: Custom command creation can now be done by anyone.
admincustom.not_bool: %1$sSilly, that's not a boolean value (true or false)!

timedisplay_set.mode_not_specified: %1$sYou need to specify a mode (12h or 24h)

server_role_disallow.no_name: %1$sYou need to specify the name of the role!
server_role_disallow.public_role: %1$sYou cannot disable the everyone role from using commands!

server_role_allow.no_name: %1$sYou need to specify the name of the role you want to allow (has to be disallowed already for this to do anything, since allow is default)!
server_role_allow.not_disabled: %1$sThis role isn't disabled! (All roles are enabled by default)

levelupmessages_message_set.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the message you want to show on user level-up. *Tip: The username of the person is done using the $(user) argument on the message*

levelupmessages_channel_set.no_channel: %1$sYou need to specify a channel to show level-up messages!
levelupmessages_channel_set.success: %1$sThe level-up channel has been set to: %2$s

birthday_message_set.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the message you want to show on birthday. *Tip: The username of the person is done using the $(user) argument on the message*

defaultmutetimeout_set.not_specified: %1$sYou have to specify a mute timeout in the format of 1m20s, for example.
defaultmutetimeout_set.wrong_format: %1$sWrong time format. You have to specify a mute timeout in the format of 1m20s, for example.
defaultmutetimeout_set.negative_notice: You cannot mute someone for negative time!

muterole_set.no_role: %1$sYou need to specify the role you want to use as the mute role. If the name has spaces try wrapping it in quotes.

birthday_test.no_user: %1$sYou need to specify an user to test the assigner with. Just mention them.
birthday_test.no_bd_channel: %1$sYou don't have any birthday channel set!
birthday_test.no_bd_role: %1$sYou don't have any role set for the birthday setter! Make sure you create a new role for it.
birthday_test.no_talk_permission: %1$sThe bot cannot speak on the birthday channel. Check channel permissions.
birthday_test.cannot_interact: %1$sThe bot is unable to interact with the birthday role. (This means the birthday role is higher than the bot's highest role on the role hierarchy, put it below and try again)
birthday_test.success: %1$sDone! The message was sent on channel %2$s for user **%3$s**. They got assigned the role **%4$s**
birthday_test.error: %1$sOw... There was an error while sending the message on channel %2$s for user **%3$s** and role %4$s

usermessage_joinmessage_add.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what extra message you want me to say when someone joins!
usermessage_joinmessage_add.success: %1$sAdded `%2$s` to the extra join messages successfully.

usermessage_joinmessage_remove.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the index of the message you want to remove!
usermessage_joinmessage_remove.success: %1$sRemoved `%2$s (index %3$d)` from the extra join messages successfully.
usermessage_joinmessage_remove.wrong_index: %1$sThat index doesn't exist! Use `~>opts usermessage joinmessage list` to see all of the available indexes

usermessage_joinmessage_list.no_extras: %1$sThere isn't any extra join messages here...

usermessage_leavemessage_add.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what extra message you want me to say when someone leaves!
usermessage_leavemessage_add.success: %1$sAdded `%2$s` to the extra leave messages successfully.

usermessage_leavemessage_remove.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify the index of the message you want to remove!
usermessage_leavemessage_remove.success: %1$sRemoved `%2$s (index %3$d)` from the extra leave messages successfully.
usermessage_leavemessage_remove.wrong_index: %1$sThat index doesn't exist! Use `~>opts usermessage leavemessage list` to see all of the available indexes

usermessage_leavemessage_list.no_extras: %1$sThere isn't any extra leave messages here...

modlog_blacklistwords_add.no_word: %1$sYou didn't specify any word to add to the modlog blacklist.
modlog_blacklistwords_add.success: %1$sWord `%2$s` successfully added to the modlog blacklist.
modlog_blacklistwords_add.too_many: %1$sThere are already too many words on the blacklist (more than 20).

modlog_blacklistwords_remove.success: %1$sSuccesfully removed word `%2$s` from the modlog blacklist.

logs_editmessage.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what message you want me to say when someone edits a message!

logs_deletemessage.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what message you want me to say when someone deletes a message!

logs_banmessage.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what message you want me to say when someone gets banned!

logs_unbanmessage.no_message: %1$sYou need to specify what message you want me to say when someone gets unbanned!

showdisablewarning.success: %1$sDisplay warning on disabled command is set to: %2$s

birthdayblacklist.no_args: %1$sYou need to specify who to blacklist from birthday announcements.

add.success: %1$sSuccessfully added %2$s (%3$s) to the birthday announcement blacklist for this server.

remove.success: %1$sSuccessfully removed %2$s (%3$s) from the birthday announcement blacklist for this server.

enable.already_enabled: %1$sGame lobby/multiple isn't disabled on this server.
enable.success: %1$sSuccessfully enabled game lobby/multiple. (If it was previously disabled)

discord_permissions.view_channel: Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels

description.headphones: That's what happens when you listen to too much music. Should be worth something, tho.
description.floppy: Might have some games. Don't copy the floppy.
description.racket: I won the game of ping-pong with Discord by a few milliseconds. Maybe.
description.forgotten: Never downloaded. Probably has been copyrighted.
description.pick: That guy liked Minecraft way too much (40 durability). (`~>mine` tool)
description.milk: Maybe it's okay to have some.
description.beverage: Does really weird stuff in big quantities. Well, depends on what kind ;)
description.lewd: Too many lewd commands. Way too many. Had fun?
description.ring: Basically what makes your marriage official.
description.letter: A letter from your loved one.
description.key: Used to open various crates with `~>opencrate <crate name>` or `~>useitem <crate name>`.
description.diamond: Basically a better way of saving your money. It's shiny too. And let's you cast shiny stuff. How nice.
description.tuxedo: What you wear when you're going to get married with a girl, or going to a nice place, or maybe everywhere, who knows?
description.shoes: 'Cause walking barefoot is just nasty. Or painful.
description.rose: The embodiment of your love. Also it's a nice decoration.
description.die_2: Even more loaded. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.booster: Used to give you some kind of boost, now it's broken. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.berserk: Currency Berserk? Anyone? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.companion: Aw, such a cute dog. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.special_ring: It's so special, it's not even a ring. `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.enchancer: A broken enchanter, I wonder if it could be fixed? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.prize: Pretty much, huh? `Leftover from Currency version 1. No longer obtainable.`
description.crate: You can use this along with a loot key to open a loot crate! Can be opened with `~>opencrate`
description.prize_2: In the first place, how did you get so much money?
description.slot_ticket: Gives you extra chance in slots, also works as bulk storage.
description.bell: Christmas reward. Gives you a cozy christmas feeling on your tree.
description.tree: Christmas reward. Who doesn't like a christmas tree?.
description.pants: Basically what you wear on your legs... hopefully.
description.haste: Allows you to collect more stuff from lootable commands for 2 sessions.
description.energy: Makes a pick or rod lose less durability per swing. Lasts only 3 mining/fishing sessions.
description.tropical_fish: A very tropical fish. Caught in fishing.
description.blowfish: I wonder... is this good? Caught in fishing.
description.comet_gem: Fragments of a comet you found while mining. Useful for casting.
description.star_gem: Fragments of a fallen star you found while mining.
description.cobweb: Something a spider left over on the mine. Wonder if it's worth something.
description.fragment: Fragment of an ancient gem. Useful for casting.
description.mop: A delightful way to clean all the dust you have around. I bet there's a lot of it.
description.claim_key: This item makes you un-claimeable (as a waifu) when you run `~>profile claimlock`.
description.coffee: A delightful way to start your day.
description.waifu_pill: Gives you a significant advantage on mine and fish if one of your waifus is valued at over 10 million. Lasts 5 sessions.
description.bait: Gives you a higher chance of catching fish.
description.diamond_pick: A very much stronger pick (150 durability). (`~>mine` tool).
description.wrench: Casting tool. Useful to put stuff together.
description.star_wrench: Casting tool. Useful to put stuff together. Less chance of breaking, needed to cast multiple items at once. Tier 2.
description.sparkle_wrench: Casting tool. Useful to put stuff together. Less chance of breaking. Less cost per cast. Tier 3.
description.comet_pick: A very much stronger pick (160 durability). (`~>mine` tool).
description.star_pick: A very much stronger pick (210 durability). (`~>mine` tool).
description.sparkle: One of the rarest gems around. Make sure to keep it. (Used to cast sparkle pickaxe & sparkle rods)
description.sparkle_pick: The strongest pick out there (450 durability). (`~>mine` tool)
description.mine_crate: A gem, you find while mining. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `~>opencrate gem crate`
description.fish_crate: A treasure you find while fishing. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `~>opencrate treasure`
description.mine_premium_crate: A gem you find while mining. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `~>opencrate gem premium crate`
description.fish_premium_crate: A treasure you find while fishing. Might have some nice stuff inside. Can be opened with `~>opencrate premium treasure`
description.shell: Found at the bottom of the ocean. What could it be worth for?
description.moon: Moon Rune. Needed to cast some stuff.
description.flake: Snowflake. Usually used as a cast ingredient.
description.broken_comet_pick: A comet pick that broke while mining. Still salvageable.
description.broken_sparkle_pick: A sparkle pick that broke while mining. Still salvageable.
description.broken_star_pick: A star pick that broke while mining. Still salvageable.
description.broken_comet_rod: A comet rod that broke while fishing. Still salvageable.
description.broken_sparkle_rod: A sparkle rod that broke while fishing. Still salvageable.
description.broken_star_rod: A star rod that broke while fishing. Still salvageable.
description.magic_watch: A magic watch that slows time when you need it. This will automatically be consumed to save your daily streak!
